text.front:
arXiv:0809.2886v3 [hep-ex]
4 Nov 2008
CP parameters of the B systems from Tevatron
S. Burdin a
on behalf of
CDF and DØ collaborations
a University of Liverpool
Recent results on CP parameters of the B systems obtained by the CDF and DØ collaborations using the data
samples collected at the Tevatron Collider in the period 2002 -2007 were presented at the QCD 2008 conference
(Montpellier, France). These results include measurements of the mixing phase φ
J/ψφ s
, decay width difference
∆Γs, and CP violation parameters in the Bs and Bu decays.
